data.text:
Khust Rayon (Ukrainian: Хустський район|) is a rayon in Zakarpattia Oblast in western Ukraine. Its administrative center is Khust, which does not belong to the district and is incorporated separately as a city of oblast significance. Population: 95,723 (2016 est.)[1].

Administrative division[]

The rayon is divided into one town council and 25 village councils. Some village councils combine several individual villages.

Administrative center: Khust

Town municipality: Vyshkovo
